{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Encore |model=ENHWI-1AN4M |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00D3F7F34 |price= |est_release_date=05/2013 |fcc_date=09/23/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Netronix |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=travel router |fcc_id=ZVY-FW152A |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''Wireless N150 Mini Router''
[http://www.encore-usa.com/us/product/ENHWI-1AN4M Product page] :[http://www.encore-usa.com/us/sites/default/files/product_file_datasheet/ENHWI-1AN4M_EN_spec_20130122.pdf Datasheet] This device looks identical (besides shell differences) to the [[ZyXEL MWR102]].. and it is ''presumed'' to be the same '''Netronix''' manufactured device. :The FCC ID ( + specifications) of the MWR102 / [[Intelligent Technology FW152A]] has been assigned to this entry based on this assumption.. Additional specifications, per '''Encore''''s datasheet, follow... *Receiver Sensitivity (typical) **11b: -88 dBm **11g: -70 dBm **11n ***20MHz: -68 dBm ***40MHz: -65 dBm *Transmitter Output Power **11b: 18 dBm (+- 1 dBm) **11g: 15 dBm (+- 1 dBm) **11n: 14 dBm (+- 2 dBm) *Dimensions (W x L x H): [[Dimensions::72 mm x 57 mm x 13.5 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::41 g]]
